thread.section_title: Albergo del Senato - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Perfect location, nice room and breakfast, Friendly staff
thread.title_full: Perfect location, nice room and breakfast, Friendly staff - Review of Albergo del Senato, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: Troels A
title: Perfect location, nice room and breakfast, Friendly staff
text:
We got an extremely good price on a room for a weekend (~315 Euroes for 2 nights, with breakfast) and requested a room with a good view. We got a room on the third floor with a view out over the Pantheon plaza. Wauw!
The room was not the biggest, but up-to-date and suited our needs. Bed was good and bathroom nice, modern and clean. Overall very satisfied witht the room - especially for the price!
Breakfast was good and offered plenty to choose from.
Staff was very helpfull and kind. They guided us to a very good family restaurant close by and to a good coffeeshop.
Location is absolutely perfect and you cant really get any better. Almost all of the best sites in Rome is within walking distance and there are many busses close by.
The only caveat is that the wifi can be slow a peak hours, bordering unusable, but this was not an issue for us, since we got free international data.
I cannot recommend this place enough and we a definitely comming back when we find such a good discounted prize again.
Room Tip: Ask for a view of the patheon plaza See more room tips
